segments.text: and soon saw two sails to winward, going directly at thwart our haws. So the hurry of my thoughts being over. This was the first time that I had seen a sail at sea. And in that one night's wickedness, I drowned all my repentance. I thought then and have always since. All my reflections upon my past conduct.
